title: Google’s Pixel Tablet Is Cheaper Than Ever
description: Get the Pixel Tablet—built with Google AI and Gemini support—at a steep discount.
content:
Who doesn't love a smart, multitasking gadget? The Google Pixel Tablet is a tablet, sure, but it's also a smart speaker, smart display, and a digital photo frame—and you can get it for a hefty $150 discount right now.

Basically, it can do it all. Here's a quick sample of why we think this deal is unmissable.
• The 11-inch adaptive display adjusts lighting to deliver brilliant colors for streaming and video calls.
• Gemini and Google AI make search faster, photo editing savvier, and productivity so much easier.
• Manage lights, locks, thermostats, and everything else in your smart home with a tap or your voice.
• Built-in Chromecast and optimized Android apps keep everything looking great.
• Share files securely across your devices using Quick Share.

This capable tablet is 38 percent off the retail price right now, but we don't know how long this deal will last.

Did we mention that Amazon shoppers give the Pixel Tablet 4.5 out of 5 stars? That's a good score! So get yours today.
summary: The Google Pixel Tablet, a smart tablet, is being sold for $150 per cent by the company. The device can also be used as a smart speaker, smart display, and a digital photo frame. It features an 11-inch adaptive display, which adjusts lighting for streaming and video calls, and can share files securely with other devices using Quick Share. However, it is uncertain how long this deal will last.
shortSummary: The Google Pixel Tablet is available for 38% discount, including discounts on Amazon, Google, and even more on Facebook.
